statements: DELETE FROM tv_shows WHERE production_studio = 'ABC Studios';
DELETE FROM tv_shows WHERE production_studio = 'ABC Studios';

DELETE FROM seasons WHERE show_id IN (SELECT show_id FROM tv_shows WHERE show_name = 'Stranger Things');
